title: Bruschetta Chicken
directions: Preheat oven to 375ÂºF. Season chicken breasts (4 ounces each) with salt and pepper. Place in baking dish or on baking sheet. Bake for 35-40 minutes, until juices run clear. While chicken is baking, combine chopped tomatoes, minced garlic, diced onions, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, a pinch of sea salt, and a pinch of pepper. Refrigerate until chicken is ready to served. Spoon over top of the chicken.
ingredients: sea salt & black pepper to taste
